basic_info.name: Denis Targansky
basic_info.description: My name is Denis Targansky, and I'm a senior full-stack Java developer with experience in AWS, Vaadin, Jira, and Bitbucket. I have years of experience in developing scalable and high-performance web and client/server applications, with a proven track record of delivering complex projects on time and within budget. When not coding, you may find me playing volleyball or sitting down for a game of Dungeons and Dragons with friends. I am also an avid 3D printing enthusiast and love exploring the latest innovations in the tech world. As a dedicated professional, I am always looking to stay ahead of the curve in the ever-evolving tech industry. I am committed to staying up-to-date on the latest technologies and best practices to provide the best solutions for my clients. Whether working solo or as part of a team, I can bring a wealth of knowledge and experience to every project I undertake.

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
points: Spearhead development of requested features and technologies for cash vault management software using Java, libraries, and frameworks such as Twilio and Vaadin, in an SOC 2 certified work environment.
Provide full technical support by communicating with customers and diagnosing issues using remote access software to improve customer satisfaction.
Onboard and train newly hired graduates using resources and documents I created during my learning period to create a pleasant and proficient working environment.
Organize and track software development through daily meetings and tools such as Jira and Status Hero to maximize productivity.

experience.title: Lead Software Developer
points: Built a web application using C#, ASP.NET Core, MSSQL, and JavaScript to meet a need of the intended target market.
Translated usage requirements into software development goals and projects in cooperation with company leader in order to streamline and accelerate development.
